Question: By the time of Live-Evil in December 1970, this person's ensemble had transformed into a much more funk-oriented group.
Hints: By age 16, this person was a member of the music society and playing professionally when not at school.
In Newport, this person had met Columbia Records producer George Avakian, who persuaded him to sign with his label.
You're Under Arrest, this person' next album, was released in 1985 and included another brief stylistic detour.
